message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I'm looking for something within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120?

Hi Bob, I understand that $180 might be a bit out of your budget. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $160. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. Considering my budget, could we discuss a price closer to $140? I believe that would be a fair compromise.

Hi Bob, I understand that $160 was still a bit out of your budget, but I'm willing to make another adjustment. I can offer you the product for $152. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. Could we consider a price of $148? I believe this would be a reasonable compromise for both of us.

Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make one more adjustment. I can offer you the product for $155. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal.
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to pay $150 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
